title: Genomic analysis of 220 CTCLs identifies a novel recurrent gain-of-function alteration in RLTPR (p.Q575E).
Coordinate loss of MHC class II expression in the diffuse large B cell lymphoma cell line OCI-Ly2 is due to a novel mutation in RFX-AP.
Conserved residues of the bare lymphocyte syndrome transcription factor RFXAP determine coordinate MHC class II expression.
